column5: With a change in the weather forcast I got a call from good friend GlennK to fish on the Richelieu River in Sabrevois Quebec in his New boat. We launched at our Lund Dealer and put in about 4.5 hours.  We stayed close to the Marina until a good portion of the fog burnt off we found some fish very close to the boats.  The fog lifted and we proceeded to Glenn's favorite spots and some of mine.  The hot lures today were red and white Mepps#5 and green chartreuse spinner baits.  After a long dry spell it felt good to catch some decent fish.In all Glenn caught 8 pike and one Large mouth Bass.  I squeeked by with a smallie and a decent Large Mouth.I am finally getting the hang of using my baitcaster reel. Thanks to the great advice on this board  What a great morning looking forward to fishing with GlennK and our sons next weekend on Lake Champlain,Swanton Vermont.  Here are some pics.            Ya I know I was due for a report  MTP

Great pics and report Mike!!!  Some good lookin' fish too!   ... you may want to consider trading boats with Glenn... since you can't catch any fish out of yours!!!     I sure am glad you live in Canada where the fish are so plentiful.... or you'd never catch anything!
Love the facts of fishing shirt, thanks for the report!
Great report and pics Mike.  It must have felt good gettin some fishin in.  Kudo's to you as well with your baitcaster.  Thanks for posting.
Good report MIke.  Didn't feel like doing it myself.  Hopefully we'll have even more pics next week.  Talk to you during the week to finalize plans.
Nice fish guys and what was the ratio of fish caugth between you and Mike? Just razzin you Mike. Dan
Great report and nice fishes!  Have a friend in Otterburn Park who keeps on trying to entice me to come down and fish the Richelieu now i can see whats there.  Thanks for posting, ehg
Great report, nice fish too....lol...i'm scared to even try a baitcaster.
Looks like some good action, good work and was thinking you're due for a report, thanks...
Great report and pics Mike  Some real nice specimens you guys caught! Thanks for sharing Leechman
Great report and nice fish. Looks like some great water to fish.

Actually the thought of trading boats did cross my mind but Junior out fishes me all the time in my boat so its lucky for him well me  Actually yesterday GlennK caught 9 fish to my 2 now I have been stuborn enough not to believe flouro carbon leaders make a difference but now I will give it a try on the next trip because well Glenn is out fishing me.So I give in.

Hey Big Bird I got a nice set of golf clubs someone gave me I'll trade you for all your fishing gear....comon you know you dont need it it will take you the next 50 years to catch enough fish to make it worth buying it all
